attributes.action: Petition to ban Biffy Clyro from being played on any UK Radio Stations.
attributes.additional_details:
Biffy Clyro's music has long been a scurge on the Human Ear, with no talent their music is repetitively used to insult the listener through the medium of Radio.
This petition will hopefully put an end to the onslaught of their music and the pain we have to suffer as a result, with it's banning from any Radio stations.
